description:
Since opening our doors, our team at The Law Offices of Pardy & Rodriguez, P.A., in Tampa, Florida, has successfully represented thousands of people in personal injury claims. Handling car accidents, slip-and-falls, workplace incidents, wrongful death and more, we consistently demonstrate that personalized service and attention to detail result in significant awards.

People who have worked with our law offices recognize our aggressive representation and compassionate environment. We know that suffering a catastrophic injury has a ripple effect into every area of your life, including health, finances, work and relationships. Our attorneys create strategies that are tailored to fit your specific needs, which means the following:

  • We meet with you where it is convenient, such as one of our six locations or even virtually.
  • Each case starts with a free initial consultation so that you can get to know us as we get to know you.
  • We have attorneys fluent in Spanish.
  • Our team accounts for your time and resources as we push forward.

We have put millions of dollars back into the hands of people who have experienced the unthinkable. As a result, we hold honors such as an inclusion in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best and a membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum.

The Law Offices of Pardy & Rodriguez, P.A., accepts credit cards.
